imdb.plot outline: The U.S. has had a history of advancing and supporting democracy around the world. What place does democracy promotion have in U.S. foreign policy today? With a choice of tools ranging from economic aid to military force, what are the appropriate yet effective methods that the U.S. should use to promote democracy?
imdb.title: Shining City on a Hill: Exporting Democracy
akas: Shining City on a Hill: Exporting Democracy (United States)
plot: The U.S. has had a history of advancing and supporting democracy around the world. What place does democracy promotion have in U.S. foreign policy today?
